ruling: - You must choose Spell Cards or Trap Cards when you activate this card.
- Any card treated as a Spell Card (a monster equipped to [[Relinquished]], etc.) when this card resolves will be destroyed.
- If you choose Trap Cards when you activate this card, and the only face-down card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Card Zones is [[Fake Trap]], the cannot activate [[Fake Trap]].
